name: Stereotypical fantasy RPG but you are the weapon seller NPC
name_original: Stereotypical fantasy RPG but you are the weapon seller NPC
description:
A game created for MageJam Vol IV game jam. Theme: Entire game on one screen
In this game you become the weapon seller NPC in a stereotypical fantasy RPG.

:^|

Special thanks: C418 for creating Stal from Minecraft OST which was not used in the game but was very inspiring nonetheless.
